languages.text: "Я не могу опекать свой род, словно они малые дети. Когда-то я подобным образом попытался опекать вас... и быстро выяснил, что у вас есть своя голова на плечах и свои суждения — пускай я и не всегда с ними соглашаюсь. Нет, мой долг — быть подле вас. Быть сенешалем".

"I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу опекать свой род, словно они малые дети. Когда-то я подобным образом попытался опекать вас... и быстро выяснил, что у вас есть своя голова на плечах и свои суждения — пускай я и не всегда с ними соглашаюсь. Нет, мой долг — быть подле вас. Быть сенешалем".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No puedo proteger a mi familia como si fuesen niños asustados. Una vez intenté protegerle a usted del mismo modo... y no tardé en comprobar que puede valerse por sí {mf|mismo|misma} y que tiene su propia opinión sobre las cosas, aun cuando no siempre esté de acuerdo con ella. No, mi deber es permanecer a su lado. Soy su senescal».
languages.original_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo proteger a mi familia como si fuesen niños asustados. Una vez intenté protegerle a usted del mismo modo... y no tardé en comprobar que puede valerse por sí {mf|mismo|misma} y que tiene su propia opinión sobre las cosas, aun cuando no siempre esté de acuerdo con ella. No, mi deber es permanecer a su lado. Soy su senescal».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「自分の家族を幼い子供のように守ることはできません。一度、あなたを同じように守ろうとしましたが…必ずしも私は同意しませんが、あなたは頭の回転が速く、物事に対して自分の意見を持っているということにすぐに気づきました。いいえ、私の務めはあなたのお側にいること。あなたの家令長であることです」
languages.original_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の家族を幼い子供のように守ることはできません。一度、あなたを同じように守ろうとしましたが…必ずしも私は同意しませんが、あなたは頭の回転が速く、物事に対して自分の意見を持っているということにすぐに気づきました。いいえ、私の務めはあなたのお側にいること。あなたの家令長であることです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我不能像保护小孩子一样保护我的家人。之前，我曾经试图用这样的方式来保护您……但很快，我就发现您有您自己的想法。您对一切事物都有您自己的见解，哪怕我并非总是赞同您的想法。不，我不会回去。我的职责就是陪在您身边，做您的总领。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: “我不能像保护小孩子一样保护我的家人。之前，我曾经试图用这样的方式来保护您……但很快，我就发现您有您自己的想法。您对一切事物都有您自己的见解，哪怕我并非总是赞同您的想法。不，我不会回去。我的职责就是陪在您身边，做您的总领。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas veiller sur les membres de ma famille comme s'ils étaient des enfants en bas âge. J'ai autrefois tenté de vous défendre de la même manière... avant de découvrir que vous avez la tête sur les épaules et vos propres opinions... même si je ne les partage pas toujours. Non, mon devoir est d'être à vos côtés et de vous servir en tant que sénéchal. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas veiller sur les membres de ma famille comme s'ils étaient des enfants en bas âge. J'ai autrefois tenté de vous défendre de la même manière... avant de découvrir que vous avez la tête sur les épaules et vos propres opinions... même si je ne les partage pas toujours. Non, mon devoir est d'être à vos côtés et de vous servir en tant que sénéchal. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann meine Familie nicht beschützen als seien sie kleine Kinder. Ich habe auch einmal versucht, Euch auf diese Weise zu beschützen ... und schnell festgestellt, dass Ihr einen eigenen Kopf und eine eigene Meinung habt. Auch, wenn ich Euch nicht immer zustimme. Nein, meine Pflicht ist es, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben. Euer Truchsess zu sein."
languages.original_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann meine Familie nicht beschützen als seien sie kleine Kinder. Ich habe auch einmal versucht, Euch auf diese Weise zu beschützen ... und schnell festgestellt, dass Ihr einen eigenen Kopf und eine eigene Meinung habt. Auch, wenn ich Euch nicht immer zustimme. Nein, meine Pflicht ist es, an Eurer Seite zu bleiben. Euer Truchsess zu sein."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."

languages.text: "Aileme çocuk muamelesi yapamam. Vaktinde sizi de böyle korumaya çalışmıştım... Ancak sonra öğrendim ki sizin de kendi aklınız, kendi fikirleriniz varmış. Bazı konularda zıt düşsek de durum böyle. Yani hayır, benim yerim sizin yanınız. Vazifem, size Seneşallik yapmaktır."
languages.original_text: "I cannot guard my family as if they were little children. I once tried to protect you in the same way... and quickly discovered that you have your own head on your shoulders and your own opinion on things — even if I do not always agree with them. No, my duty is to be at your side. To be your Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "Aileme çocuk muamelesi yapamam. Vaktinde sizi de böyle korumaya çalışmıştım... Ancak sonra öğrendim ki sizin de kendi aklınız, kendi fikirleriniz varmış. Bazı konularda zıt düşsek de durum böyle. Yani hayır, benim yerim sizin yanınız. Vazifem, size seneşallik yapmak."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
